name: Payment Reminder List
query:
select 
    pr.name as "Payment Reminder:Link/Payment Reminder:140",
    pr.party_type as "Party Type:Data:100",
    pr.party_customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:140",
    pr.party_supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:140",
    pr.total_outstanding_amount as "Outstanding Amount:Currency:140",
    (select idx from `tabReminder Table` where parent = pr.name order by idx desc limit 1 ) as "Number of Reminders:Int:100",
    (select remarks from `tabReminder Table` where parent = pr.name order by idx desc limit 1 ) as "Feedback From Client:Data:150",
    (select reminder_date from `tabReminder Table` where parent = pr.name order by idx desc limit 1 ) as "Last Reminder:Date:100"
    from `tabPayment Reminder` pr where pr.status = 'Open';
